content.question: The Proclamation of 1763 sought to

choices.label: raise revenue in the British North American colonies to pay for the war against France
affirm the power of Parliament over the colonies
prevent conflicts with American Indians on the colonial frontier
establish British control over New France
make provisions for prosecuting smugglers before Admiralty courts

content.answer: prevent conflicts with American Indians on the colonial frontier

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
